Text: RE MercedKim thanks for your quick response and patience Were going to do something My guess is next week I guessed this morning in some analysis I did so the magnitude of the change in price was not unexpected Jeff Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston To Jeff Fuller Email Sent AM Subject Merced Jeff Got your message this morning and we have refreshed the blend and extent price for you For MMbtuday at the PGE City Gate for January through December the blend and extend price is Nymex for the outer years has been moving up since last week therefore the little increase in price Let me know if there is anything else you need Thanks Kim This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW Forward Natural gas and Electric Costs Cc Kim can you help Merced out with a year PGE citygate price assuming a start see message below Ill get them the electricity price Indicative price is fine We are not going to transact Got your message too about gas prices moving up We are still looking at the blendextend versus an outright swap of the last almost years Ill be in touch Thanks for your help Jeff Original Message From Roy Price mailto Sent Friday October AM To Cc Garith Krause Subject Forward Natural gas and Electric Costs Jeff Do you have on hand data on natural gas futures for years and Electric Prices projected for years If Available we can use them this morning I know the lead time Is short but would appreciate any help you can provide Thanks Roy

RE Forward Natural gas and Electric CostsKim Thanks for you quick response I hope to bring closure to the other gas deal next week Have a good weekend Jeff Original Message From mailto Sent Friday October AM To Subject RE Forward Natural gas and Electric Costs Jeff A year fixed price indication at the PGE City Gate out of Jan is approximately I hope this is helpful Let me know how I can help facilitate the blend with Merced Let me know if there is any thing else that you need thanks Kim Original Message From Jeff Fuller ENRON Sent Friday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Cc Garith Krause
